section.p: A record of a tubefeeding product that is requested for a patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] productCode with data type Code
A tubefeeding product that is requested to be administered to a patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quantity with data type Integer Ratio
The quantity of the product that is requested to be administered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] strength with data type Code
A code representing the strength of the tubefeeding product requested (e.g., full strength, half-strength, etc.).

Contains exactly one [1..1] productCode with data type Code
A tubefeeding product that is requested to be administered to a patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quantity with data type Integer Ratio
The quantity of the product that is requested to be administered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] strength with data type Code
A code representing the strength of the tubefeeding product requested (e.g., full strength, half-strength, etc.).
